description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav which renders the top navigation bar of the application. It includes links, search input, theme toggle, and action buttons for chat, notifications, and quick actions.

methods.name: TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application's top navigation bar with brand, search, theme toggle, and action buttons.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick }) {$/

ctags.name: isDark
ctags.pattern: /^          aria-label={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}$/

ctags.name: isDark
ctags.pattern: /^          title={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}$/

fields.name: aria-label={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}
title={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}
